lore.archers.flint_spear: A crude spear, made from a shard of flint. Excels at poking enemies through their armor.
lore.archers.golden_spear: A gleaming spear, tip plated in gold. Weak, but makes for a good display piece.
lore.archers.iron_spear: An iron spear, standard for infantrymen and more. Excels at poking enemies through their armor.
lore.archers.diamond_spear: A diamond spear, with an incredibly sharp tip. Excels at poking enemies through their armor.
lore.archers.netherite_spear: An exceedingly rare spear, tipped with a blade of pure netherite.
